Heads up boys and girls


******************* Virus Alert *****************=
**


Please be aware of the latest computer virus which has been named 
Bea=
gle.AZ. Bagle.AZ is a new variant of the Bagle worm spreading rapidly 
over=
 the Internet. If you have received any email that contains this 
virus, de=
lete it immediately. Do not forward to others, and do not open 
the attachm=
ent. You will be able to identify the virus because it will 
arrive in an e=
mail with the following attributes:
Subject: will contain either...
=B7    =
     Re:
=B7         Re: Hello
=B7         Re: Thank you!
=B7         Re: T=
hanks :)
=B7         Re: Hi
Body: will contain either...
=B7         * :)
=
=B7         * :)
Attachment: will contain either...
=B7         Price
=B7  =
       price
=B7         Joke
If the attachment is executed, it opens two d=
ifferent Internet protocol
ports on your computer that are designed to allo=
w your machine to function
as a relay to send spam email.



[Non-text port=
ions of this message have been removed]
